IX.iii.1.F.2.j
.
Resolving the Status of a Dependent
When an award includes the income of an unestablished dependent, send notification
advising the claimant of the basis for the award, and
inviting the claimant to submit both a supplemental claim and the evidence necessary to establish the dependent(s).
If such evidence is received, add the dependent or remove the income, as appropriate.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section F - Dependents for Current-Law Pension Purposes
